name: The Scary Notre Dame
description:
# TheScaryNotreDame

You all know the well-known Disney story "The Hunchback of Our Lady". In the end, the girl did not choose Casimodo.

He was very sad and not happy at all, so sad... that he let himself die alone near Notre Dame de Paris, which has changed a lot due to the renovation. But his soul did not leave, and he remained haunting these places for many years...

That's when you enter the scene. Your goal: to kill the hunchback. But, the only way to kill him is by a cauldron which is by chance in a closed place, and especially, you must take the hunchback there... You'll have to help this big jerk

while recovering the necessary to reach the Cauldron, and finish all this business...

How to play the game :

Complete the objectives and avoid the monster.

ESCAPE - Quit

SHIFT - Run

WASD - Move

E - Interact

Made by :

Arcen & Miitos
